game.name: DCS: F/A-18C Operation Mountain Breeze by Sandman Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: In the fall of 2015, the battles of the Syrian Civil War between the rebels and the Syrian government forces continue intensely. The involvement of several foreign powers, ISIS, and Hezbollah in the conflicts further escalates tensions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the fall of 2015, the battles of the Syrian Civil War between the rebels and the Syrian government forces continue intensely. The involvement of several foreign powers, ISIS, and Hezbollah in the conflicts further escalates tensions.
